alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 1:44AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON...OSWEGO...AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow will continue across southern and central Jefferson County, northern Lewis County and far northern Oswego County through the wee hours of the morning. This band of snow is producing 2 to 3 inch per hour snowfall rates. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...This band of heavy lake effect snow will remain nearly stationary. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Stony Point, Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Adams, Herrings, Adams Center, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, Southwick Beach State Park, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Sackets Harbor, Martinsburg, Henderson, Black River and Smithville. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 44. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
